Text.Name: Happy1
Text.Desc: I don't know why but, I feel cheerful all of a sudden.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that When one's this cheerful, it really brightens one's day

Text.Name: Happy2
Text.Desc: For some reason I feel quite happy all of a sudden.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Nothing's ever wrong with a little extra happiness

Text.Name: Happy3
Text.Desc: I don't know why but I'm having a hard time with things all of a sudden.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Who knows why, but things seem a bit depressing all of a sudden

Text.Name: Happy4
Text.Desc: I feel a sense of dismay, it seems like everything is getting worse.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Who knows why, but things seem quite depressing

Text.Name: Happy5
Text.Desc: It feels like nothing is going right...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Who knows why, but everything seems quite disheartening

Text.Name: Happy6
Text.Desc: I feel fired up! Like I could take on the world!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Spirits seem to soar all of a sudden

Text.Name: Happen1
Text.Desc: I feel enveloped in an indescribable feeling...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that A twisted look on the face gives little evidence as to what thoughts lie underneath

Text.Name: Happen2
Text.Desc: I feel all alone...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that There's a palpable sense of desolation about

Text.Name: Happen3
Text.Desc: I feel like I'm being watched...
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Feeling like one is being watched is always discomforting

Text.Name: Happen4
Text.Desc: Is somebody talking to me? It feels like someone is whispering in my air, but the words can't quite be made out...this is annoying.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Hearing things really preys on the nerves

Text.Name: Magic1
Text.Desc: I feel really good for some reason.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Who knows why, but who's going to complain about a smile on one's face?

Text.Name: Magic2
Text.Desc: I feel horrid, but I don't know why.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Inexplicably, things seem to be causing immense sorrow to well up

Text.Name: ZhenkongJie
Text.Desc: I feel hollowed out.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that This Tribulation leaves one feeling empty and ill at ease

Text.Name: FengShui1
Text.Desc: This room's Feng shui is quite good, it's like a blessing.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such good Feng shui leaves one beaming

Text.Name: FengShui2
Text.Desc: The Feng shui is this room is not bad, things seem to be going well as a result.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such good Feng shui lends a radiance to one's aura

Text.Name: FengShui3
Text.Desc: This room's Feng shui really is not the best and it's causing a lot of problems.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Less than ideal Feng shui is making things more difficult for this one

Text.Name: FengShui4
Text.Desc: The Feng shui in this room is horrid and so it feels like the whole world is against lately.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Feng Shui this bad leaves one feeling dark and gloomy

Text.Name: FengShui5
Text.Desc: I think there's something wrong with the Feng Shui in this room.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Feng Shui this poor leaves a frown on one's face

Text.Name: Tool_PerfectWorld
Text.Desc: Such a beautiful world this is, everything seems so interesting.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The understanding that this world is so beautiful leaves one extremely satisfied

Text.Name: Mood_Tool_LunHui_QiYuan
Text.Desc: I can really feel the power of the Heart of Prayer!
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that The power of the Heart of Prayer leaves one quite content

Text.Name: Dan_LunHui1
Text.Desc: I feel moved by this memory and a bit content as a result.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Such a moving memory leaves one in a deep reverie

Text.Name: Mood_Item_Laxative
Text.Desc: I feel like I'm falling apart...I don't feel so good.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Diarrhea is never welcome, it always darkens one's day

Text.Name: Mood_LunHui_ShiYi
Text.Desc: I try to enjoy the moment, rather than dwell so much on the past.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that It seems like something is being prepared for..

Text.Name: Mood_LunHui_XinNian
Text.Desc: I believe in the Law and that without is not something that I trouble over.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Conviction provides encouragement

Text.Name: Mood_GreenBrothel
Text.Desc: Just released themselves and it felt good.
Text.StoryDesc: Feeling that Went to the Green Pagoda and it felt very good
